meanings.definition: Able to be petted or stroked.
meanings.sent1: The fluffy kitten was so pettable that everyone wanted to cuddle it.
meanings.sent2: The soft rabbit's fur was very pettable, making it a favorite among children.
meanings.sent3: The pettable puppy wagged its tail happily as it received belly rubs.
meanings.sent4: The pettable teddy bear seemed to come to life in the child's arms.
meanings.sent5: The pettable pony nuzzled against the fence, seeking attention from passersby.

meanings.definition: Suitable for being petted or stroked.
meanings.sent1: The gentle horse was a pettable companion for the young girl.
meanings.sent2: The soft fabric of the blanket was pettable and comforting to touch.
meanings.sent3: The pettable fabric softener made the clothes feel extra cozy.
meanings.sent4: The pettable toy was a hit at the daycare, loved by all the children.
meanings.sent5: The pettable cat purred contentedly as it enjoyed the attention of its owner.
